full_summary:
# Tender Notice - Cartridge, 7.62mm x 39 Ball FMJ 122gr Ammunition

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Reference Number**: CB-699-72113970 (Amendment 4)
 
**Project Description**:

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites suppliers to submit a proposal for the supply of Cartridge, 7.62mm x 39 Ball FMJ 122gr Ammunition to the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF).

**Scope of Work**:

The requirement includes the supply of 520,000 cartridges to Canadian Forces Ammunition Depot (CFAD) Dundurn, Saskatchewan, and 780,000 cartridges to CFAD Angus, Milton, Ontario, both on or before March 1, 2025. The cartridge is used with the Assault Rifle AK-47 for familiarization training.

**UNSPSC Code**: 46101601 - Defence or law enforcement ammunition

**Security Requirements**:

No security requirements are associated with this procurement.

**Controlled Goods**:

This procurement may be subject to the Controlled Goods Program.

**Bid Submission**:

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information**:

For further information or clarification, please contact:
Trevor Clark, (613) 698-5046, [Trevor.Clark@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Trevor.Clark@forces.gc.ca)

**Notice of Amendment**:

The tender is amended as per Amendment 1, 2, and 3 posted on CanadaBuys.

**Amendment Date**:  July 18, 2024

**Notice Availability**:

This notice is available on the CanadaBuys website at:

- https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37799/rfp---cartridge%2C-7.62mm-x-39-ball-fmj-122gr-ammunition.pdf
- https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37799/rfp-amendment-002---cartridge-7.62mm-x-39-ball-fmj-122gr-ammunition.pdf
- https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37799/rfp-amendment-001---cartridge%2C-7.62mm-x-39-ball-fmj-122gr-ammunition.pdf
- https://canad
